General.Name: Zevia Pbc
General.Description: Zevia PBC develops, markets, sells, and distributes zero sugar beverages in the United States and Canada. The company offers soda, energy drinks, and organic tea under the Zevia brand name. It serves grocery distributors; national, convenience, natural products, and warehouse club retailers; and retailers through a network of grocery, food, drug, warehouse club, mass, natural, convenience, and e-commerce channels, as well as natural product stores and specialty outlets. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Encino, California.
General.Address: 15821 Ventura Boulevard, Encino, CA, United States, 91436
